00037 /**
00038  * @brief Log time of existance on destruction. Throw an error, if the given
00039  * upper limit is not satisfied.
00040  */
00041 class oruw_timer
00042 {
00043     public:
00044         oruw_timer(const char* timer_id, const unsigned int timer_limit);
00045         ~oruw_timer();
00046 
00047         bool isLimitSatisfied ();
00048 
00049     private:
00050         qi::os::timeval end_time;
00051         qi::os::timeval start_time;

00053         string id;
00054         double limit;
00055 };
00056 
00057 #define ORUW_TIMER(limit) oruw_timer timer(__FUNCTION__,limit)
00058 #define ORUW_TIMER_CHECK if(!timer.isLimitSatisfied()){ORUW_HALT("Timer protection!\n");}
